title: Memoria Iusti In Benedictione!
creator: Weber, Gottfried
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Weber, Gottfried: Memoria Iusti In Benedictione!  Ad Orationem Panegyricam ... Domino Martino Weisio, Medicinae Doctori ... Pie denato Et In Splendida Exequiatorum Frequentia, Ritu Christiano, In Festo Annunciationis Mariae publice humato, In Gymnasii Berlinensis Auditorio Maiori, a.d. XXVII. Martii. A.O.R. MDCXCIII. dicendam & audiendam ... Omnes Musarum Et Literatorum Patronos Et Fautores, Dominos, Moecenates Et Evergetas Humillime, Observanter, Amice, Invitat M. Gottfried Weber/ Rector. Berolini  Berlin 1693
